item.description:
Planet Zydeco (VT Zydeco)
SARAH & Tallboys, PLANET Zydeco and VINCE Thompson HOUSE PARTY
Bishop's Castle, 199 Austin Farm Road, Exeter, RI 02822-1602 Barn, Large Wood Dance Floor
Donation $20, 2:00PM to 9:00PM
Sarah plays early so if you want a tall order of music come right out, but the music continues through afternoon and evening with Planet Zydeco (No intro Needed) and Vince Thompson's country and rockabilly roots. Bring what you want to eat and drink, something for the potluck, lawn chairs & BSOSSM (Bathing suits of self-sufficient modesty). Info: (401) 392-0212

I know this is late notice, I am already signed up for bbq but I would rather be dancing.. too much food this summer. This place is great fun, but music is loud and might not hear cell phone so call me so I can tell you where to meet if you plan on coming and i never met you. Also helps if a picture of yourself is posted so I know who you are?  I might cancel if i dont get anyone interested in coming.
item.how_to_find_us: CELL PHONE 401-225-6859 there will not be a meetup sign.. Call my cell before 2pm so I can tell you were to meet me.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Zydeco bands, dancing, and Pot Luck, BYOB.
